desc: Selling high quality raw pet food, treats and supplements in Brantford, ON.

layout.text:
STORE LOCATION
507 Colborne St., Brantford, ON
REGULAR BUSINESS HOURS
Mon-Tues - Closed
Wed-Saturday - 11:00AM - 6:00PM
Sunday - 12:00PM - 5:00PM
Rawdical Pet Foods is a supplier of raw food, treats, and supplements for your pets. Whether you are experienced or new to raw feeding, we can assist you in finding the right products.
Online ordering is now available for in-store pick up. Orders are typically ready for pick up within 24 hours. *Don’t see something you need/want? Give us a call to place a special order.
